text: (light music)

- [Narrator] In today's
fast-paced cloud environment,
quick access to software, data,
and professional services is critical

to running your business
and accelerating innovation.

AWS Marketplace is a
curated digital storefront,

helping companies of all
sizes find, try, buy, deploy,

and manage solutions from
thousands of trusted AWS partners.

AWS Marketplace helps
you discover thousands

of software listings across
security, DevOps, data,
and analytics, generative AI and more,
all from leading vendors that run on AWS.

Learn how to solve
industry-specific use cases
by accessing curated industry storefronts
and product details.

AWS Marketplace sellers
offer pricing flexibility
with thousands of free trials

and pay as you go purchasing,
ensuring you only pay
for what you need.
When ready for a bigger investment,
save money with long-term contracts,
bing your own license

or negotiate custom pricing
and terms with private offers.

With AWS Marketplace, you
can optimize time to value

with standardized contracts
and vendor security profiles.

Launch products fast with
quick launch capabilities.

Put controls into place to
protect your organization

and even create your
own private marketplaces
of pre-approved products.

Consolidate your third party
spend with AWS billing,

helping you simplify
invoicing, track spending,
and manage budgets.

Ready to accelerate your
innovation in the cloud?
Get the software, data

and services you need
with AWS Marketplace.
